sub_title: Senior Consultant |  Senior Business Advisor  |   CEO & Co-Founder
summary:
🎓MSc., BBA, International Business, Hanze University of Applied Sciences

🖇Product Management, Business Scale-up, Marketing Strategy, Content Strategy, Brand Storytelling

📈Experienced strategist with background in tech, marketing and research. Starting with an academic background on complex studies, I moved to in parallel developing marketing, content and communication skills through entrepreneurship, as well as product management and strategy in SaaS.

school.name: Hanzehogeschool Groningen / Hanze University of Applied Sciences Groningen
Hanzehogeschool Groningen / Hanze University of Applied Sciences Groningen
School of Music and Arts Nr. 2, Bucharest, Romania

awards.title: ESN Groningen’s Got Talent Award
awards.description: The ESN Groningen's Got Talent Show aimed to reward talented students from Groningen from many artistic areas such as music and comedy. From the 10 participants, I was the winner of the first prize that was a public's choice. Everyone in the crowd received a paper with all names of participants and they had to choose the two people they preferred.

awards.title: Database Design and Programming with SQL
awards.description: Award of Achievement for successfully completing the Oracle Academy Database Design and Programming with SQL final exam.

awards.title: Uniplaces Scholarship 2016
awards.description: The Uniplaces Scholarship competition is a worldwide essay competition that evaluates the willingness of a student to aid others. Uniplaces offered 15 scholarship worth of 2,000EUR for students who show help towards the others. This scholarship aims to help the students to be able to pay for their rent expenses during one year of university abroad. I was one of the 15 people from all over the world to receive one of the scholarships.

awards.title: Mention - 2014 Shakespeare School Essay Competition
awards.description: The topic of the competition was based on the following statement: "Message to my future self". In this essay, students had to create a 250 word essay that showed clear introspection skills, a good level of English and creativity. In total, there were 3000 participants with a total of 30 awarded people.
awards.issuer: Shakespeare School Association for Education, Bucharest Romania

awards.title: Composition 1st prize - "Folk fara varsta" / Ageless folk Contest, 7th edition
awards.description: The "Folk fara varsta" contest is a national Romanian contest where students participate in either composition or interpretation sections. I won the 1st prize of the composition section, with a self-written folk song. In this contest, students are expected to show skills and creativity as well as impress a jury of well-known folk singers and performers.

profile_positions.title: Senior Consultant

profile_positions.description: Freelance: Shifting my role with Oro Muscles from a centralized marketing task to a coordination role between advising the marketing team and technical team for output creation and deadline management. Offboarding content responsibilities to the new content specialist.
profile_positions.title: Senior Marketing Strategy Advisor

profile_positions.description:
Through @Visual Arts Lab, I have the opportunity to support the business development processes (with a focus on marketing) for the Oro Muscles team. I work freelance on this project, ensuring a coaching and work hybrid project process. Here, I work closely with the Oro team to: 

•create marketing and strategy goals
•create workflows and strategic KPIs
•create digital content with the full Visual Arts Lab team (social media videos, photos, communication templates, etc.)
•facilitate product marketing management coaching and a ‘learning by doing’ environment’ for the Oro team
profile_positions.title: Marketing Advisor

profile_positions.description:
As of February 2020, the start-up based on a creative agency model under the name of Visual Arts Lab was born. As co-founder and marketing and communications officer, I have roles of bridging the communication between customers and the artists, finding and creating contracts and invoices, archiving all financial and business paperwork and engage and update customers and visitors with social media posts and news.

From 2020 to 2022, we expanded on the following areas of work and expertise: 

•video creation for cross-channel communication
•event and live moment capturing (photos and videos for events, livestreams, weddings, education, corporate events)
•graphic design on multiple areas (branding, creative, communication)
•website UX design and implementation per budget (wordpress or own code)
•expertise, consultancy and coaching on areas around marketing and strategic implementation

The future looks good: we are in the planning of major project releases for new areas of work, so keep following us!
profile_positions.title: Chief Executive Officer | Co-Founder

profile_positions.description: Product Manager for WeFitter API, in charge of product and marketing roadmap strategy and execution.
profile_positions.title: Product Manager

profile_positions.description: I support Two Can Productions with their business growth, from idea to development. This is done as a strategic partnership, being both a business consultant as well as content creator and strategic advisor.
profile_positions.title: Business Consultant

profile_positions.description: Student member (post-graduation) in the accreditation panel of a university of applied sciences in the Netherlands.
profile_positions.title: Panel Member

profile_positions.description: Student member (post-graduation) in the accreditation panel of a university of applied sciences in the Netherlands.
profile_positions.title: Panel Member

profile_positions.description: Part-time research and project support for the Interreg North Sea Region RIGHT Project. Tasks mainly focusing communication support with activities such as supporting the team with social media strategies and plans, as well as creative content, while in the past including  activities like research and further developed of past projects.
profile_positions.title: Project Communication Support

profile_positions.description: Innovation Assignment within the MSc. in Business Studies Programme at the Hanzehogeschool Groningen. The assignment focuses on enhancing the existing regional impact assessment tool of the RIGHT Project in collaboration with the university and SNN.
profile_positions.title: Junior Researcher

profile_positions.description: For my graduation project I am conducting research for the Interreg North Sea Region Programme RIGHT project on developing socio-economic regional impact measurement tool for innovation hubs.
profile_positions.title: Undergraduate Research Assistant

company.name: Hanzehogeschool Groningen / Hanze University of Applied Sciences Groningen

profile_positions.company: Hanzehogeschool Groningen / Hanze University of Applied Sciences Groningen
profile_positions.description:
As part of the MSc. Interdisciplinary Business Professional programme, I am currently in the process of writing my master's thesis for the Lectoraat Duurzaam Coöperatief Ondernemen (eng. Sustainable Cooperative Entrepreneurship lectorate). During a period of six months, I will be studying how the regional agrofood industry can be supported in becoming a more cooperative and inclusive ecosystem by developing a new potential regional value chain framework, under the supervision of both Hanzehogeschool and the lectorate.

The final grade for the research project was 8.3.
profile_positions.title: Research Intern

profile_positions.company: Hanzehogeschool Groningen / Hanze University of Applied Sciences Groningen
profile_positions.description: The faculty of International Business provides students with an information desk where both students and teachers can receive assistance and information. At the IBS Info Desk there are 4 students working together to facilitate a helpful and welcoming environment for everyone. As an info desk assistant, you are required to do a great variety of tasks, out of which some are customer service related, public relations related, communications, logistics and administrative tasks as well as designing posters and banners for the events inside and outside the faculty in order to promote them on the information screens. I believe this is a highly diverse working environment, both social wise as well as task wise.
profile_positions.title: Info Desk Assistant

profile_positions.company: Hanzehogeschool Groningen / Hanze University of Applied Sciences Groningen
profile_positions.description:
The "Open Days" at Hanzehogeschool is an event that takes place 3 times a year where prospective students together with their parents or peers get in contact with lecturers and students who answer questions about the programmes offered, give advice on the study and hold presentations related to the International Business environment.
The student assistants are required to be present throughout all event days, help organize the event rooms, be proactive and engage in discussions with the guests as well as support the lecturers and organizers with presentations regarding their experience at Hanze.

I participated as a student assisstant for the Open Days event from 2017-2018, and the February and April Open Days in 2020.
profile_positions.title: Student Assistant for "Open Days"

profile_positions.company: Hanzehogeschool Groningen / Hanze University of Applied Sciences Groningen
profile_positions.description: Call center assistant for promoting the programmes offered at Hanzehogeschool to prospective Romanian students who participated in educational fairs.
profile_positions.title: Call Agent

profile_positions.company: Hanzehogeschool Groningen / Hanze University of Applied Sciences Groningen
profile_positions.description: Hanzehogeschool organizes events for international students to be able to experience the life as a student at different courses. For the International Business study, I was one of the students to welcome the Romanian and Bulgarian groups of students for 2 days at Hanze. My tasks ranged from picking them up from the central station, helping them with their accommodation, giving them a tour of the city as well as show them the student life as a Romanian student in Groningen.
profile_positions.title: Hanze Experience Student Assistant

profile_positions.description: Owing to my activity with the International Business School of Hanze UAS, I was selected to have a contract with the Hobeon group in order to be the student panel member for the accreditation of the International Business School, Saxion, Enschede.This task required fore and post-project readings, research, and during the job it required teamwork in an international environment, as well as professionality and objectivity.
profile_positions.title: Accreditation Panel Member

volunteer_experiences.description: The GUTS (Groningen University Theatre Society) group is a drama association which performs in Groningen. For their adaptation of the Greek mythology, Medea, I volunteered to evaluate, train and direct their choir.

company.name: Hanzehogeschool Groningen / Hanze University of Applied Sciences Groningen

volunteer_experiences.description: For the integration of the Romanian and Bulgarian students within Hanzehogeschool, I had helped organize the “martisor” event, a cultural tradition on the 1st of March. In this project I dealt with the social media marketing and poster design, as well as the design of the room and decorations.

The KEI Week is an introduction week for both Dutch and international students who want to get a grasp of the student life in Groningen. In this week, the leaders of groups are expected to welcome a group of 15-25 students with a group dinner, take them to different offered activities, socially and culturally engage with them as well as make sure they feel like they belong in the said group.

The ESN Intro Week is an event for both exchange as well as regular students in Groningen who wish to experience the student life in Groningen. The group leaders have to welcome the groups of 15-25 students with a dinner, take part in different scheduled activities with them, come up with ideas to constantly entertain the group as well as make sure the participants have the feeling of belonging to the group they are assigned to.

volunteer_experiences.role: ESN Live Music Night Singer & Performer
volunteer_experiences.description: The ESN Live Music Night is an event founded by the ESN Groningen where students from all over the world gather together to perform in front of a big crowd on some of the biggest concert stages in Groningen.
For the Facebook page “Students of Groningen” of the Hanzemag from Hanzehogeschool, I had written an article about an international’s student story.

company.name: "School for Children with Disabilities Nr. 1", Bucharest, Romania

volunteer_experiences.description: This project deals with giving children with disabilities the chance to socially interact with students who are willing to share their knowledge in different areas and help them improve in the said subjects. I was a music and arts teachers, thus my tasks were to help them express themselves through different activities and tasks during their music course.

company.name: "Engleza pentru Viata" Association, Shakespeare School Romania

volunteer_experiences.description: The "Engleza pentru Viata" (Eng. English for Life) Association facilitates children who do not own the financial resources for English courses besides the normal curriculum with volunteers who aim to help them achieve the best level of English in the most enjoyable environment. In this project, volunteers are expected to prepare enjoyable, accessible and catchy activities and course outlines in order to offer children a memorable experience at the same time as the fastest learning environment.

During my high-school years, I actively participated in the co-organization of the "Papillons" Choir, founded in my high-school. As tasks, I did social media promotion and advertisement, I recruited participants, organized schedules and helped with the rehearsals' management.
